categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources
Category:Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Crusader was a Victory-class Star Destroyer in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.
Commanded by Captain Zlece Oonaar, this ship, along with her sister ship Bombard, destroyed the Eyttyrmin Batiiv pirate armada at the Battle of Khuiumin.

Crusader supported Bombard from a distance during the battle, remaining in position to intercept the fleeing pirates. After routing the Eyttyrmin Batiiv armada, she destroyed their stronghold on the surface of Khuiumin with a barrage of concussion missiles.

Crusader was later seen in the service of Grand Admiral Thrawn during his campaign against the New Republic, and was the last known location of Zyix K'zzt in Stormtrooper Colonel TC-1289's body when Airen Cracken issued the 10,000 credit bounty for his capture.
